resources.string: Here at SipMap we love sitting down for a cold beer. We also enjoy the company of good friends. What a peculiar bunch we are.

We started working on SipMap as an after-work project. The idea was a to produce a simple app to connect old and new friends together for a beer. A simple idea, you click a button and your friends receive a broadcast to see where you\'re sipping. That\'s how things got started.
Have a good time with us. Chill, socialize, have a sip.
